ygData.subject: **Dont email me personally please**
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I have been receiving a lot of emails recently from people asking me where to get stuff and how to do such and such. I do not have time to answer all 50
ygData.messageBody:
Hi, I have been receiving a lot of emails recently from people asking me
where to get stuff and how to do such and such. I do not have time to answer
all 50 msg's i get from people each day. That is what the lists are for.
There is also a fairly large ggroup of people who think (dont know what
they're thinkin actually), that EQ-*****-owner@onelist.com is the address of
the mailing list.. well it isn't; those messages get sent to me only, and
they are deleted and not answered. Only email me if you have a problem with
sending or receiving mail from the list or soemthing like that, nothing to
do with where to get 'blah'. Thanks a lot.

* David Abdemoulaie
* mailto:DAcash18@...
* ICQ - 21360590
